name: Gingery Sweet Potato Apple Juice
description: This winter juice turns boring old sweet potatoes into a rich and mellow drink that's lightened with apple and spiced with fresh ginger.
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup (4 ounces) fresh sweet potato juice from about 1 medium sweet potato
1/2 cup (4 ounces) fresh apple juice from about 1 medium apple
1 teaspoon fresh ginger juice from one 1" section fresh ginger

recipeInstructions.text: Stir juices together thoroughly, pour into a glass, and serve immediately (sweet potato juice oxidizes rapidly).
